trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around January 6th 2012
divs: sighting details8:40 pm: i was traveling west on toll road 528 in orlando @ exit #2. i saw to my left a blue light hovering in the air(approx 200ft from me and 300ft in the air. it slowly got brighter and dimmer repeatedly. it moved to the right just a little bit 3 times. as i grabbed for my phone\camera it started backing away from me first lowering altitude then raising altitude back to original altitude repeatedly till it was out of sight. i watched it perform this action approx 5 times before it was out of sight. i did get 2 pictures as it was leaving.
